channel.title: כרמי ציון | Carmei Zion – Ein Yaakov / Seder Kodashim / Zevahim
channel.description: Ein Yaakov – Seder Kodashim – Zevahim shiurim from רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).
channel.itunes:author: רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon)
channel.itunes:summary: Ein Yaakov – Seder Kodashim – Zevahim shiurim from רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).

item.title: Zevahim 116b - Ifra Hormizd, the mother of King Shapur
item.description: Zevahim 116b - Ifra Hormizd, the mother of King Shapur — זבחים קטז: - איפרא הורמיז אימיה דשבור מלכא — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1MHDwmHb3w6daitMTw2g3RB9-jtMBIVgtEa8eeZuV9mI/edit?usp=drive_link. Presented by רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).
item.itunes:author: רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon)

item.title: Zevahim 115b - There are times when a man is silent and receives reward for his silence
item.description: Zevahim 115b - There are times when a man is silent and receives reward for his silence — זבחים קטו: - פעמים שאדם שותק ומקבל שכר — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1t3Y1qBJJaGzV9xhTvBaIjIt99AYzhv5wcFKoDYDXiYA/edit?usp=drive_link. Presented by רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).
item.itunes:author: רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon)

item.title: Zevahim 113a - The flood of Noah did not descend into Eretz Yisrael
item.description: Zevahim 113a - The flood of Noah did not descend into Eretz Yisrael — זבחים קיג. - לא ירד מבול לארץ ישראל — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/17hPcsUAyDCTBFqzNoF15b5GxBuR98u1yO9mGOKknrDk/edit?usp=drive_link. Presented by רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).
item.itunes:author: רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon)

item.title: Zevahim 102a - Even this time a flaring of anger had lasting consequences
item.description: Zevahim 102a - Even this time a flaring of anger had lasting consequences — זבחים קב. - אף זה נאמר בו רושם — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/18tldpfCYRyjkEV3q-aRWAa2SGAWFF-USkClTpn8uuyk/edit?usp=drive_link. Presented by רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).
item.itunes:author: רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon)

item.title: Zevahim 53b - A corner of the altar without a foundation
item.description: Zevahim 53b - A corner of the altar without a foundation — זבחים נג: - קרן שאין לה יסוד — Source sheet: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1tLBentMm8OV3GnUtXgWa7IOrqCVcXbVCi1rOmqGaWIE/edit?usp=drive_link. Presented by רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon).
item.itunes:author: רון נחשון (Ron Nahshon)
